records.name: Acknowledgement
records.description: Record to represent the acknowledgement of content updated by the publisher.

fields.name: httpVersion
fields.description: The HTTP version understood by the client

fields.name: http1Settings
fields.description: Configurations related to HTTP/1.x protocol

fields.name: http2Settings
fields.description: Configurations related to HTTP/2 protocol

fields.name: timeout
fields.description: The maximum time to wait (in seconds) for a response before closing the connection

fields.name: poolConfig
fields.description: Configurations associated with request pooling

fields.name: auth
fields.description: Configurations related to client authentication

fields.name: retryConfig
fields.description: Configurations associated with retrying

fields.name: responseLimits
fields.description: Configurations associated with inbound response size limits

fields.name: secureSocket
fields.description: SSL/TLS related options

fields.name: circuitBreaker
fields.description: Configurations associated with the behaviour of the Circuit Breaker

records.name: ClientConfiguration
records.description: Record to represent client configuration for HubClient / PublisherClient

fields.name: headers
fields.description: Additional Request headers to include when distributing content

fields.name: contentType
fields.description: The content-type of the payload

fields.name: content
fields.description: The payload to be sent

records.name: ContentDistributionMessage
records.description: Record to represent a WebSub content delivery.

fields.name: status
fields.description:
Status of the request processing. This is `200 OK` by default since
this is a successful response

records.name: ContentDistributionSuccess
records.description: Record to represent the successful WebSub content delivery.

records.name: ListenerConfiguration
records.description: Provides a set of configurations for configure the underlying HTTP listener of the WebSubHub listener.

fields.name: leaseSeconds
fields.description: The period for which the subscription is expected to be active in the `hub`

fields.name: webHookConfig
fields.description: HTTP client configurations for subscription/unsubscription intent verification

records.name: ServiceConfiguration
records.description: Configuration for a WebSub Hub service.

fields.name: hub
fields.description: URL of the `hub` to which the subscriber has subscribed

fields.name: hubMode
fields.description: Current `hub` action

fields.name: hubCallback
fields.description: Callback URL for subscriber to receive distributed content

fields.name: hubTopic
fields.description: Topic to which subscriber has subscribed

fields.name: hubLeaseSeconds
fields.description: Amount of time in seconds during when the subscription is valid

fields.name: hubSecret
fields.description: Secret Key to sign the distributed content

records.name: Subscription
records.description: Record to represent the subscription request body.

records.name: SubscriptionAccepted
records.description: Record to represent the subscription accepted by the `hub`.

fields.name: code
fields.description: Status code for the action

records.name: SubscriptionPermanentRedirect
records.description: Record to represent the permanent subscription redirects.

fields.name: code
fields.description: Status code of the action

records.name: SubscriptionTemporaryRedirect
records.description: Record to represent temporary subscription redirects.

fields.name: topic
fields.description: `Topic`, which should be unregistered from the `hub`

records.name: TopicDeregistration
records.description: Record to represent the topic-deregistration request body.

records.name: TopicDeregistrationSuccess
records.description: Record to represent the successful topic deregistration.

fields.name: topic
fields.description: `Topic`, which should be registered in the `hub`

records.name: TopicRegistration
records.description: Record to represent the topic-registration request body.

records.name: TopicRegistrationSuccess
records.description: Record to represent the successful topic registration.

fields.name: hubMode
fields.description: Current `hub` action

fields.name: hubCallback
fields.description: Callback URL for subscriber to received distributed content

fields.name: hubTopic
fields.description: Topic from which subscriber wants to unsubscribe

fields.name: hubSecret
fields.description: Secret Key to sign the distributed content

records.name: Unsubscription
records.description: Record to represent the unsubscription request body.

records.name: UnsubscriptionAccepted
records.description: Record to represent the unsubscription acceptance.

fields.name: msgType
fields.description: Type of the content update message

fields.name: hubTopic
fields.description: Topic of which the content should be updated

fields.name: contentType
fields.description: Content-Type of the update-message

fields.name: content
fields.description: Content to be distributed to subscribers

records.name: UpdateMessage
records.description: Record to represent the content update message.

fields.name: verificationSuccess
fields.description: Flag to notify whether a subscription verification is successfull

records.name: VerifiedSubscription
records.description: Record to represent the completed subscription.

fields.name: verificationSuccess
fields.description: Flag to notify whether a unsubscription verification is successfull

records.name: VerifiedUnsubscription
records.description: Record to represent a completed unsubscription.

parameters.name: msg
parameters.description: Content to be distributed to the topic subscriber

returnParameters.description:
An `error` if an exception occurred, a `websubhub:SubscriptionDeletedError` if the subscriber responded with `HTTP 410`,
or else a `websubhub:ContentDistributionSuccess` for successful content delivery

or else a `websubhub:ContentDistributionSuccess` for successful content delivery

initMethod.name: init

clients.name: HubClient
clients.description: HTTP Based client for WebSub content publishing to subscribers

returnParameters.description: An `error` if an error occurred registering the topic or else `()`

remoteMethods.name: registerTopic
remoteMethods.description:
Registers a topic in a Ballerina WebSub Hub to which the subscribers can subscribe and the publisher will publish updates.
```ballerina
error? registerTopic = websubHubClientEP->registerTopic("http://websubpubtopic.com");
```

returnParameters.description: An `error`if an error occurred un registering the topic or else `()`

remoteMethods.name: deregisterTopic
remoteMethods.description:
Deregisters a topic in a Ballerina WebSub Hub.
```ballerina
error? deregisterTopic = websubHubClientEP->deregisterTopic("http://websubpubtopic.com");
```

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: The topic for which the update occurred

parameters.name: contentType
parameters.description: The type of the update content to set as the `ContentType` header

returnParameters.description: An `error`if an error occurred with the update or else `()`

remoteMethods.name: publishUpdate
remoteMethods.description:
Publishes an update to a remote Ballerina WebSub Hub.
```ballerina
error? publishUpdate = websubHubClientEP->publishUpdate("http://websubpubtopic.com",{"action": "publish",
"mode": "remote-hub"});
```

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: The topic for which the update occurred

returnParameters.description: An `error`if an error occurred with the notification or else `()`

remoteMethods.name: notifyUpdate
remoteMethods.description:
Notifies a remote WebSubHub from which an update is available to fetch for hubs that require publishing.
```ballerina
 error? notifyUpdate = websubHubClientEP->notifyUpdate("http://websubpubtopic.com");
```

parameters.name: config
parameters.description: The `websubhub:ClientConfiguration` for the underlying client or else `()`

returnParameters.description: The `websubhub:PublisherClient` or an `error` if the initialization failed
An `error` if an error occurred registering the topic or else `()`

```ballerina

returnParameters.description: An `error`if an error occurred un registering the topic or else `()`

```

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: The topic for which the update occurred

parameters.name: contentType
parameters.description: The type of the update content to set as the `ContentType` header

returnParameters.description: An `error`if an error occurred with the update or else `()`

methods.name: publishUpdate
methods.description:
Publishes an update to a remote Ballerina WebSub Hub.
```ballerina
error? publishUpdate = websubHubClientEP->publishUpdate("http://websubpubtopic.com",{"action": "publish",
"mode": "remote-hub"});
```

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: The topic for which the update occurred

returnParameters.description: An `error`if an error occurred with the notification or else `()`

methods.name: notifyUpdate
methods.description:
Notifies a remote WebSubHub from which an update is available to fetch for hubs that require publishing.
```ballerina

```

parameters.name: config
parameters.description: The `websubhub:ClientConfiguration` for the underlying client or else `()`

returnParameters.description: The `websubhub:PublisherClient` or an `error` if the initialization failed

clients.name: PublisherClient
clients.description: The HTTP based client for WebSub topic registration and deregistration, and notifying the hub of new updates.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The path of the service to be hosted

returnParameters.description: An `error` if an error occurred during the service attaching process or else `()`

lifeCycleMethods.name: attach
lifeCycleMethods.description:
Attaches the provided `websubhub:Service` to the `websubhub:Listener`.
```ballerina
check hubListenerEp.attach('service, "/hub");
```

parameters.name: config
parameters.description: Custom `websubhub:ListenerConfiguration` to be provided to the underlying HTTP listener

returnParameters.description: The `websubhub:Listener` or an `error` if the initialization failed

methods.name: init
methods.description:
Initiliazes the `websubhub:Listener` instance.
```ballerina
listener websubhub:Listener hubListenerEp = check new (9090);
```

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The path of the service to be hosted

returnParameters.description: An `error` if an error occurred during the service attaching process or else `()`

methods.name: attach
methods.description:
Attaches the provided `websubhub:Service` to the `websubhub:Listener`.
```ballerina
check hubListenerEp.attach('service, "/hub");
```

returnParameters.description: An `error` if an error occurred during the service detaching process or else `()`

methods.name: detach
methods.description:
Detaches the provided `websubhub:Service` from the `websubhub:Listener`.
```ballerina
check hubListenerEp.detach('service);
```

returnParameters.description: An `error` if an error occurred during the listener-starting process or else `()`

methods.name: 'start
methods.description:
Starts the registered service programmatically.
```ballerina
check hubListenerEp.'start();
```

returnParameters.description: An `error` if an error occurred during the listener-stopping process

methods.name: gracefulStop
methods.description:
Gracefully stops the hub listener. Already-accepted requests will be served before the connection closure.
```ballerina
check hubListenerEp.gracefulStop();
```

returnParameters.description: An `error` if an error occurred during the listener-stopping process or else `()`

methods.name: immediateStop
methods.description:
Stops the service listener immediately. It is not implemented yet.
```ballerina
check hubListenerEp.immediateStop();
```

parameters.name: config
parameters.description: Custom `websubhub:ListenerConfiguration` to be provided to the underlying HTTP listener

returnParameters.description: The `websubhub:Listener` or an `error` if the initialization failed

initMethod.name: init
initMethod.description:
Initiliazes the `websubhub:Listener` instance.
```ballerina
listener websubhub:Listener hubListenerEp = check new (9090);
```

returnParameters.description: An `error` if an error occurred during the service detaching process or else `()`

otherMethods.name: detach
otherMethods.description:
Detaches the provided `websubhub:Service` from the `websubhub:Listener`.
```ballerina
check hubListenerEp.detach('service);
```

returnParameters.description: An `error` if an error occurred during the listener-starting process or else `()`

otherMethods.name: 'start
otherMethods.description:
Starts the registered service programmatically.
```ballerina
check hubListenerEp.'start();
```

returnParameters.description: An `error` if an error occurred during the listener-stopping process

otherMethods.name: gracefulStop

Gracefully stops the hub listener. Already-accepted requests will be served before the connection closure.
```ballerina
check hubListenerEp.gracefulStop();
```

returnParameters.description: An `error` if an error occurred during the listener-stopping process or else `()`

otherMethods.name: immediateStop
otherMethods.description:
Stops the service listener immediately. It is not implemented yet.
```ballerina
check hubListenerEp.immediateStop();
```

constants.name: COMPRESSION_ALWAYS
constants.description: Always set accept-encoding/content-encoding in outbound request/response.

constants.name: COMPRESSION_AUTO
constants.description:
When service behaves as a HTTP gateway inbound request/response accept-encoding option is set as the
outbound request/response accept-encoding/content-encoding option.

constants.name: COMPRESSION_NEVER
constants.description: Never set accept-encoding/content-encoding header in outbound request/response.

annotations.name: ServiceConfig
annotations.description: WebSub Hub Configuration for the service.

errors.name: BadSubscriptionError
errors.description: Error type representing the errors in the subscription request.

errors.name: BadUnsubscriptionError
errors.description: Error type representing the errors in the unsubscription request.

errors.name: ContentDeliveryError
errors.description: Error type representing the internal errors in the content distribution.

errors.name: Error
errors.description: Represents a websubhub distinct error.

errors.name: InternalSubscriptionError
errors.description: Error type representing the internal errors in the subscription action.

errors.name: InternalUnsubscriptionError
errors.description: Error type representing the internal errors in the unsubscription action.

errors.name: ServiceExecutionError
errors.description: Represents a websubhub service execution error.

errors.name: SubscriptionDeletedError
errors.description:
Error type representing the subscriber ending the subscription
by sending `HTTP 410` for the content delivery response.

errors.name: SubscriptionDeniedError
errors.description: Error type representing the validation errors in the subscription request body.

errors.name: TopicDeregistrationError
errors.description: Error type representing the errors in the topic unregistration action.

errors.name: TopicRegistrationError
errors.description: Error type representing the errors in the topic registration action.

errors.name: UnsubscriptionDeniedError
errors.description: Error type representing the validation errors in the unsubscription request body.

errors.name: UpdateMessageError
errors.description: Error type representing the errors in the content update request.

types.name: Compression
types.description:
Options to compress using Gzip or deflate.

`AUTO`: When service behaves as a HTTP gateway inbound request/response accept-encoding option is set as the
outbound request/response accept-encoding/content-encoding option
`ALWAYS`: Always set accept-encoding/content-encoding in outbound request/response
`NEVER`: Never set accept-encoding/content-encoding header in outbound request/response

enums.name: MessageType
enums.description: Enum to differentiate the type of the content-update message.
